requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal Summoned or Special Summoned this card, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Choose 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field with 100 or more original ATK. While this card is face-up, it gains ATK equal to [that monster's original ATK], and if that monster's original DEF is 100 or more, this card gains DEF equal to [that monster's original DEF].
